subject: Networking & The Paranormal
author: eastern_paranormal
full_text:
Hi,

I wanted to let everyone know we have started a new network just for paranormal enthusiast at:


http://easternparanormal.ning.com/

All you need to do is go to the upper right hand corner and click sign up :)

It is similar to Facebook, but run by Eastern Paranormal. I just posted it online a few days ago. There we can add videos, pictures, file uploading is easy, EVP's or music can be uploaded easily, interaction between everyone overall is easy.

I look forward to seeing you there!

Gabreael
